value:
Enough standing idle. Send me into
battle so I may cut our foes down
with this sword.

Seiros... Until I tear you to shreds,
not even death itself can restrain me.

You are young and inexperienced...
An army must be commanded by
a powerful presence.

If you could summon my 10 Elites
to this world, we would be a force
without equal.

I have had a thousand years of sleep.
Nights offer me no rest...

Friends are not worth the trouble...
But I bring regards from your ally
$Nf all the same.
I am overflowing with power.
A shadow of my former glory.
Far from what I once was...
This is fitting for me.

I am Nemesis, King of Liberation,
Hero among Heroes.

You've pulled me from the clutches
of idleness. For that... I owe you a
debt, $Nu.$k$pWhen I first arrived, I was tempted to
cut you down and claim this land.
But you are more than I expected.$k$pYou have proven your strength to me,
so I will lend mine to you.$k$pThe strong rule over the weak.
That is the natural order.$k$pWith your strength and mine, to rule
would be a simple thing indeed.
I am looking forward to it...
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
Return to nothingness.
Clear the way.
Obliteration!
I will break you.
This is the end...
Fwahaha!
You dare to compete with me for command?
Do you think I don't see you lurking there?
No mere human can so much as scratch me.
I was slain long ago...by a woman named Seiros.
This world too will be liberated.
Seiros... I must kill Seiros...
You are sure to keep me entertained...
Hm.
What is it?
I will go.
